dmca.title: [ABUSE] [1390218] Fraudulent use of VeriSign Logo (http://www.switzerland-onlinebooki
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 10:35 AM
To: phishing-response@verisign.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [1390218] Fraudulent use of VeriSign Logo
(http://www.switzerland-onlinebookinghotel.com/lucerne_hotels/flora_hotel.sh
tml)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [1390218] Fraudulent use of VeriSign Logo
(http://www.switzerland-onlinebookinghotel.com/lucerne_hotels/flora_hotel.sh
tml)
Date: Wed, 15 Feb 2006 15:30:00 UT
From: phishing-response@verisign.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com, webmaster@switzerland-onlinebookinghotel.com

To Whom It May Concern,

It has come to our attention that you display a VeriSign Seal on your
website
'http://www.switzerland-onlinebookinghotel.com/lucerne_hotels/flora_hotel.sh
tml'.
As you are not a VeriSign Customer and VeriSign has not authenticated your
website you are not authorized to display the VeriSign Seal or logo on your
website.

We request that you immediately remove the VeriSign seal or logo from
'http://www.switzerland-onlinebookinghotel.com/lucerne_hotels/flora_hotel.sh
tml'
until such time that you do decide to obtain a VeriSign Certificate for that
site (whereafter you will be entitled to display the new VeriSign Secured
seal).

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Phillip Woodall
VeriSign Threat & Vulnerability Group
phishing-response@verisign.com
1-866-880-7025 (US) / 1-650-426-7025 (International)
-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--
Electronic Privacy Notice. This e-mail, and any attachments, contains
information that is, or may be, covered by the Electronic Communications
Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. 2510-2521, and is also confidential and proprietary
in nature. If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that you
are legally prohibited from retaining, using, copying, distributing, or
otherwise disclosing this information in any manner.
Instead, please reply to the sender that you have received this
communication in error, and then immediately delete it. Thank you in advance
for your cooperation.
============================================================================
==


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
